scripts.rename_css: node -e "require('fs').rename('main.css', 'styles.css', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run rename_css
scripts.release: npm run build && mkdir build && shx cp main.js styles.css manifest.json build
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
